I am currently awaiting trial for manslaughter. This game ruined my life forever, would not recommend. My mom was sick of me not getting a job or going to school and instead played this shit game. I wanted to become pro player but I have 40 ping so impossible and I have dog barking really loud so I cannot hear comms. I finally had enough after my mom recommended the nearest Best Buy so I decided to take the closest thing to me (my keyboard), and use it as an axe. I dug the thing 3 inches deep into her skull and ruined my sick rig. Wasted 3000 on my setup and am going to jail for a long time. I will probably lose my csgo virginity in prison when I accidently slur in the showers and they get angry. 0/10 would not recommend.

Trash.

Ever wanted to play against hacker's. Play the free to play version. Don't want to play against hackers don't play prime matchmaking. Your only two options are player ran servers, the two most popular are ESEA and FACEIT. There and only there is the only place you can truly play the game. Valve has just given up on solving the hacking issue and now are just milking the game till it dies. Hence it going free to play.

The game itself is amazing. Probably the best shooter on the market. The only downfall of the game is the hackers and that's it. So if you are going to buy at least play matchmaking until high gold then move onto ESEA or FACEIT.
